label: How much I hate what I'm doing?
description: 0: you hate everything you're doing, 10: you save the world... and you think the world is worth saving

label: How much I destroy my body at work?
description: Even if it should be taken care of at a society level

label: How much pain I get from doing my job?
description: Pain could be effort, sweating, waiting in the cold or anything non pleasant and not damageable

label: How much I'm emotionally impacted by my work?
description: How much of your mental workload you bring home

label: How much value I bring with my work?
description: The value created by your work : how many and how much people take advantage of your work

label: How rare are my skills?
description: How easily you can be replaced by someone else

label: How much I sacrificed to train my skills?
description: 100: you had to give up your life and the one of your kids to eat only noodles and mustard for 3 years?
